verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: signed] [ARG1: an executive order to end the separation of migrant families along the US - Mexico border] [ARGM-LOC: amid fierce backlash both at home and abroad] .
President Donald Trump on Wednesday signed an executive order to [V: end] [ARG1: the separation of migrant families along the US - Mexico border] amid fierce backlash both at home and abroad .
